aviatrix.description: Aviatrix is an arcade space shooter PC game, infused with Sci-Fi elements and Web3 technology, all powered by blockchain. Fly through the universe as a legend, taking on a never-ending onslaught of enemies and epic bosses!

aviatrix.step3: Download the game and play with your invited account.

sky-warlord.title: Sky Warlords
sky-warlord.description: Aviatrix Mobile is a Mobile version Sci-Fi Web2 arcade space shooter game where you battle against an endless wave of enemies and bosses to become the legend of the galaxy!

falcon-badge.title: Player-owned Economy
falcon-badge.description: Onboarding players in a scalable economy powered by blockchain
falcon-badge.description-falcon: Game points that provide players with utilities such as buying and upgrading in-game assets, trading digital items and enrolling in exclusive competitions.
falcon-badge.description-reward: Action-proved points are built on the scarcity-driven and conjunctive model that allows players to redeem them for gift cards and crypto.
falcon-badge.ecosystem-content: Divided by Chains, United by Space Falcon. Multiple collections spread out on various blockchains to bring all gamers and blockchain technology enthusiasts under one roof.

games.incoming-description: The games created by Space Falcon with the mission to onboard the next generation of players.

blog.title: Find Out More!
blog.description: Get to know about the games, ecosystem, essential features and latest updates
blog.content-blog-2: Game points that provide players with utilities such as buying and upgrading in-game assets and enrolling in exclusive competitions.
blog.content-blog-3: Action-proved points are built on the scarcity-driven and conjunctive model that allows players to redeem them for gift cards and crypto.
blog.content-blog-1: In the Aviatrix galaxy, peace reigned among planets like Ondora, Avalore, Zenithar, and Celestis until the Darkonians, seeking power, stole the vital Avia crystal. Hero academies have emerged to find the missing crystal and avert a planetary catastrophe. Aviatrix seeks heroes to join the quest and save their world.
blog.subscribe: Be the first to know about new updates, giveaways, tournaments and more!

about-us.our-mission-content: Our mission is to create an ecosystem that transforms the gaming industry by leveraging the power of blockchain technology. We strive to be the leading pioneer in providing great virtual experiences that meet the evolving needs of gamers worldwide.
about-us.team-content: Our team is a dynamic group of professionals with extensive experience in the gaming and tech industries. We have talented experts from TOP companies in software development, game design, finance, and marketing, who work collaboratively to deliver cutting-edge results.
about-us.careers-content: We are always on the lookout for talented individuals who share our passion for gaming and innovation. We value diversity, collaboration and continuous learning, so if you are looking for a career that enables you to do what you love and work on big projects, we encourage you to join our team!

error-messages.mustBiggerThanZero: Must be a valid amount (bigger than 0)
error-messages.passwordsMatch: New password and confirm password must be matched
error-messages.errorChangePassword: New password cannot be the same as your old password
error-messages.limitTimeToChange: Can not change username less than 60 days
error-messages.atLeastOneLetter: Must contain at least one letter
error-messages.atLeastOneNumber: Must contain at least one number
error-messages.atLeastOneSpecialCharacter: Must contain at least one special character
error-messages.sameCurrentUsername: New username must be different from the current one
error-messages.requiredPaste: Please check the text for any prohibited spaces or emojis.

leaderboard.enroll-text: Enroll to Aviatrix tournament and share the 6K$ FCON prize pool!
leaderboard.leaderboard-description: The numbers below represent the dates of the current month. Please select a date to view the data.
leaderboard.daily-reward: The Rewards Points are distributed to the winners on 00:01 (UTC) every 24 hours.
leaderboard.top-players: The leaderboard displays the top players of the selected day and the number of Reward Points they have earned.

FAQ.title1: How does the Aviatrix Tournament work?
FAQ.content1: The top players with the highest game score receive Reward points daily which can be used to redeem to USDC. The total prize pool is 6000$ FCON from which 100$ FCON is being distributed for the TOP rankings every 24 hours.
FAQ.title2: When will I get my daily Rewards Points?
FAQ.content2: Reward Points will be sent to your account at the end of each day, specifically at 00:01 (UTC) of the following day.
FAQ.content3: The Reward are distributed in RP (Reward Points) which can be redeemed for $FCON daily with 1:1 ratio.
FAQ.content4: No, they won’t. You can redeem them any time you want.
FAQ.title5: How do I check my daily rewards?
FAQ.content5: To check your daily rewards, select the date in the calendar section and view the score and rankings of the chosen day. Keep in mind that Reward Points are distributed to TOP 20 ranks.
FAQ.title6: How can I redeem my RP for $FCON?
FAQ.content6: To redeem your RP to $FCON, follow the instructions provided on our platform. Simply navigate to the redemption page and choose the amount of RP you want to convert to $FCON.
FAQ.title7: Where can I find the daily Hall of Fame?
FAQ.content7: The daily Hall of Fame, showcasing the TOP players of each day, are posted on our official Twitter and Discord channels. Make sure to check it out to see if you made it.
FAQ.title8: Can I participate in the Aviatrix Tournament multiple times?
FAQ.content8: Yes, you can participate in the Aviatrix tournament every day if you have the ticket. Your score and ranking will be recorded separately, allowing you to compete for rewards every 24 hours.
FAQ.title9: Who can participate in the Aviatrix Tournament?
FAQ.content9: The Aviatrix tournament is open to all players as long as they have a ticket. The FREE Ticket can be acquired by pre-ordering the Aviatrix Starter Pack or Free Enroll
FAQ.title10: How can I get a ticket for the Aviatrix tournament?
FAQ.content10: We provide two options of getting the Ticket: You can claim it by Pre-ordering the
FAQ.content10-1: with 0$ FCON. Keep an eye out for opportunities to earn FREE tickets.

faq.question-1: What is Aviatrix Starter Pack Pre-sale?
faq.answer-1: It’s an early sale with limited supply and lower price for early investors before the public sale.
faq.question-2: Where can I find the Pre-sale?
faq.answer-2: Pre-sale is open in our website and Discord server.
faq.question-3: When can I claim my NFT?
faq.answer-3: Aviatrix Starter Packs will be distributed after both, Pre-sale and public sale are over. (Date TBA)
faq.question-4: What can I do with Aviatrix Starter Pack?
faq.answer-4: Holders get full access to farming, boost score, staking + yield boost, Aviatrix Tournament and occasional SOL, USDC and FCON airdrops.
